text: The Minority Floor Leader of the House of Representatives of the Philippines, or simply the House Minority Floor Leader, is the leader elected by the minority bloc of the House of Representatives of the Philippines that serves as their official leader in the body. ==List of minority floor leaders== Minority Floor Leader Party Term start Term end Legislature House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of the Philippines Eugenio Pérez Nacionalista 1945 1945 1st Congress Cipriano P.
